item.title: US-95 South/ID-6 West at ID-6 Split
item.description: US-95/ID-6 at ID-6 west to Palouse (Washington). Continue south on US-95 for Moscow and Lewiston.

item.title: US-95 South Approaching ID-6 West
item.description: US-95 south approaching ID-6 west.

item.title: US-95 South/ID-6 West - Deep Creek
item.description: US-95/ID-6 at the Deep Creek bridge.

item.title: ID-6 West at US-95
item.description: ID-6 west at US-95. ID-6 west briefly joins US-95 south. Use US-95 north for Plummer. Use US-95 south/ID-6 west for Moscow and Lewiston.

item.title: ID-6 West Approaching US-95
item.description: ID-6 west approaching US-95

item.title: ID-6 - Potlatch
item.description: ID-6 in Potlatch where the highway turns northwest from 6th St.

item.title: End ID-9 North at ID-6
item.description: End ID-9 north at ID-6. Use ID-6 west for Potlatch. Use ID-6 east for St. Maries

item.title: End ID-9 at ID-6
item.description: End ID-9 north at ID-6.

item.title: ID-9 North Approaching ID-6
item.description: ID-9 north approaching ID-6

item.title: Welcome To Idaho - ID-6 East
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on ID-6 east.

item.title: US-95 north at ID-6 West
item.description: US-95 north at ID-6 west to Palouse. ID-6 joins US-95 north to Potlatch.

item.title: US-95 North Approaching ID-6
item.description: US-95 north approaching ID-6 west.

item.title: ID-3 north at ID-6
item.description: ID-3 north at ID-6. The White Pine Scenic Byway follows ID-3 north from here to Rose Lake.

item.title: ID-3 North Approaching ID-6
item.description: ID-3 north approaching ID-6. Use ID-6 west for Potlatch. Use ID-3 north for St. Maries and Coeur d’Alene.

item.title: US-95 North/ID-6 At ID-6 East
item.description: US-95 North/ID-6 East at ID-6 junction. Turn right for ID-6 east to Potlatch; merge left for US-95 north to Plummer and Coeur d’Alene.

item.title: US-95 North/ID-6 Approaching ID-6 East
item.description: US-95 North/ID-6 at ID-6 east junction near Potlatch.

item.title: US-95 North at ID-6 West
item.description: US-95 north at ID-6 west to Colfax (Washington). Continue north on US-95/ID-6 East to Potlatch and Coeur d’Alene.

item.title: US-95 North Approaching ID-6 West
item.description: US-95 north approaching ID-6 west in Latah County.

item.title: End ID-6 East at ID-3
item.description: End ID-6 east at ID-3. The brown shields indicate a state scenic byway, in this case White Pine Scenic Byway. The White Pine Scenic Byway turns north on ID-3 here.

item.title: End ID-6 East at ID-3
item.description: End ID-6 east at ID-3. Continue straight for ID-3 south to Clarkia; turn left for ID-3 north to St. Maries and Coeur d’Alene.

item.title: ID-6 - White Pine Scenic Byway
item.description: White Pine Scenic Byway map along ID-6 in Potlatch. Each scenic byway in Idaho has one of these maps near the beginning and end of each byway.

item.title: ID-6 South - White Pine Scenic Byway
item.description: ID-6 South, the White Pine Scenic Byway near Santa in Benewah County.

item.title: ID-6 East - Welcome To Idaho
item.description: Idaho Welcome Sign on ID-6 East, ID-WA Border. This style of welcome sign was standard from around 1990 up until 1998.
